description: The project will support the removal of barriers to the implementation of renewable energy systems for rural electrification.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Through the project, a regulatory framework will be developed that will provide the legal and economic guidelines required for establishment of sustainable renewable-energy-service-companies (RESCOs) for the rural sector. The cost of electricity production from renewable energy systems will be estimated and subsequently, tariffs to be charged to rural consumers will be established.
subproject.title: Fiji Renewable Energy Project

title: Fiji Renewable Energy Service Company Project
